DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate two L-Carnitine-based product muscle function healthy old adult ( 55 70 year old ) . These product suspect improve muscle function possibly promote building muscle mass . One third subject Carnipure Product 1 , one third Carnipure Product 2 one third placebo .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Clinical Trial Efficacy Two Carnitine-Based Products Muscle Function Healthy Older Adults
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female adult , age 55 70 year BMI 21 kg/m2 33 kg/m2 Subjects good physical condition perform exercise test safely , determine Qualified Investigator base medical history , physical examination , electrocardiogram laboratory result Subjects sedentary currently engage regular exercise . Subjects agree maintain current level activity current dietary habit throughout trial period . Subjects give voluntary , write , inform consent participate study . Subjects smoker smoker within past 1 year screening . Subjects pregnant breastfeed Subjects experience weight loss gain great 4.5 kg ( approximately 10 lb ) within 3 month randomization Subjects diagnose active heart disease Subjects uncontrolled hypertension ( â‰¥ 140 mmHg ) Subjects renal hepatic impairment disease Subjects major disease gastrointestinal , pulmonary endocrine system Subjects history seizures Subjects Type I Type II Diabetes Subjects active cancer ( exclude basal cell carcinoma ) Subjects neurological significant psychiatric illness , include Parkinson 's disease bipolar disorder Subjects unstable thyroid disease Subjects immunocompromised ( HIV positive , antirejection medication , rheumatoid arthritis ) Subjects metal fixation plate screw previous surgery Subjects take oral anticoagulant ( blood thinner ) warfarin ( Coumadin ) Dabigatran ( Pradaxa ) antiplatelet agent Clopidogrel ( Plavix ) Subjects regularly take NSAID medication aspirin , must stop least one week prior microneedle muscle biopsy procedure . Subjects know allergy anesthetic Subjects currently experience medical condition interferes ability undergo physical strength test study Subjects currently take NHPs must use current dose regimen least one month prior baseline must maintain current dose regimen throughout trial must begin take new NHPs throughout trial . If subject wish stop take NHP prior begin trial , must least 1 week prior randomization . Subjects use illicit drug history alcohol drug abuse within past 6 month Subjects currently consume great 2 standard alcoholic drink per day . Subjects participate clinical research trial within 30 day prior randomization . Subjects allergy sensitivity investigational product ingredient . Subjects cognitively impaired and/or unable give inform consent Subjects abnormal laboratory result medical psychological condition , opinion Qualified Investigator , may adversely affect subject ability complete study measure may pose significant risk subject .
